name: Brake The Illusion
description:
This Little Rouge-Like Top-Down Shooter is about a poor guy who trapped in an illusion.

This game is a submission for the Brackeys Game jam 2022.1, with the theme: It is not real.  This was my second game jam and first to alone. I over scoped a little  so i didn't have enough time to add sounds sadly but overall i learned a lot and it was a fun experience .

The Art and the Programming made all by me.

 -- When you enter the new level sometimes a wall push you out of the room --
